name: gyre
descr: Analytical gyre. Common to mimic ocean currents using a simple analytical flow field. Values are from [Kularatne 2016, Time and Energy Optimal Path Planning in General Flows]

name: point_symmetric_techy2010
descr: Point symmetric analytical flow field. Considered in [Techy 2011, https://doi.org/10.1007/s11370-011-0092-9]

name: three_obstacles
descr: Experimental flow field where obstacles are outward blowing virtual wind obstacles

name: big_rankine
descr: Big Rankine vortex (core of the vortex) to force trajectories looping before reaching destination

name: four_vortices
descr: Four vortices almost symmetrical with an increment of flow speed in the bottom part to break symmetry

name: moving_vortex
descr: Moving vortex as an example of simple analytical unsteady flow field

name: linear_time_varying
descr: Gradient of flow field where the intensity of the gradient evolves in time

name: moving_vortices
descr: Multiple analytical vortices moving in the frame

name: gyre_rhoads2010
descr: Special gyre setting showing a sharp discontinuity in the value function (time-to-go) at the origin

name: spherical_geodesic
descr: No flow field. Verification case for the computation of the geodesic path in plate carree coordinates.

name: chertovskih
descr: Problem setting in which the optimal trajectory to destination follows a border (state constraint).

name: dakar_natal_constr
descr: Problem with unsteady flow field, spherical coordinates and featuring obstacles. Appearing in [Schnitzler et al., https://doi.org/10.1109/LCSYS.2023.3284339]

name: obstacle
descr: No flow field. Verification case featuring a single obstacle.

name: trap
descr: Special case with flow field acting as a trap for the vehicle.

name: stream
descr: Stream of flow field. Appearing in [Subramani et al., https://doi.org/10.1016/j.ocemod.2016.01.006]
